Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Were the Officer's reasons for finding misrepresentation under IRPA inadequate?
Crimes.Outcome: Judicial review granted, case remanded for redetermination
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Second PR application rejected due to alleged misrepresentation
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Alleged misrepresentation of material facts in employment history
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to explain how inconsistencies constituted material misrepresentation
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to analyze provided evidence or establish materiality
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Remanded for new determination by different officer
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of analysis of submitted evidence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to adequacy of officerâ€™s reasons
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to provide clear, precise, and intelligible reasons
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to assess materiality and evidence

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Were the Officer's reasons for finding misrepresentation under IRPA 40(1)(a) adequate?
Crimes.Outcome: Judicial review granted, case remanded for new determination
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Second PR application rejected based on alleged misrepresentation
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Withholding or providing false material facts that could induce error
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to specify nature of misrepresentation or analyze evidence
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Case returned for redetermination by different Officer
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Evidence provided by applicant regarding employment
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Adequacy and intelligibility of decision reasons
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of engagement with submitted evidence
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Doubt cast on employment history accuracy
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge based on inadequacy of reasons
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to meet clarity and precision standards in decision writing
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to specify misrepresentation and assess evidence
